description: This file sets up a basic Slack integration with an AI agent, configuring the agent with OpenAI's GPT-4 model, and exposes a web app for serving the Slack bot.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific configurations.

classes.name: SlackAPI
classes.description: Handles Slack API integration and web app setup.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model configuration.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Returns the web application instance for the Slack API.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Starts the web server to serve the Slack app.
